RecoEdge documentation¬∂

A one-stop solution to build your recommendation models, train them and, deploy them in a privacy-preserving manner‚Äì right on the users‚Äô devices.

RecoEdge allows you to easily explore new federated learning algorithms and deploy them into production.

The steps to building an awesome recommendation system are:

  • üî© Standard ML training: Pick up any ML model and benchmark it using standard settings.

  • üéÆ Federated Learning Simulation: Once you are satisfied with your model, explore a host of FL algorithms with the simulator.

  • üè≠ Industrial Deployment: After all the testing and simulation, deploy easily using NimbleEdge suite

  • üöÄ Edge Computing: Leverage all the benefits of edge computing

Getting Started

New to RecoEdge? Check out the getting started guide. It will walk you through the moto of RecoEdge and the steps to get started

To the getting started guides

Tutorials

The tutorials provides in-depth information on the key concepts of RecoEdge with useful background information and explanation.

To the tutorials

Developer Docs

The reference guide contains a detailed description of the RecoEdge API. The reference describes how the methods work and which parameters can be used. It assumes that you have an understanding of the key concepts.

To the developer docs

Contributing guide

Saw a typo in the documentation? Want to improve existing functionalities? The contributing guidelines will guide you through the process of improving SciPy.
